title: Degenchad

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: what is this airdrop for? i meant i have seen that some airdrops related to the arbitrum but it seems like the token related airdropn was being so far from now. Mostly of airdrop was NFT related airdrop by project that used or having partnership with arbitrum. I do know that if you are looking for the viewers but im sure that if the main thing must be using the arbitrum protocol and this is pretty similar like when you were eligible to the optimism airdrop. You have need to used it for once in your life to be eligible for the tokens.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Degenchad on June 28, 2022, 05:16:12 PMi made a video guide to week 2 of arbitrum odyssey event for guys who prefer to watch instead of readUndoubtedly, the Arbitrum Odyssey attracted increased attention among the community, which led to an increased load on the network and, accordingly, an increased cost of gas, which exceeded the existing commission on the Ethereum network. Considering the above, it was decided to suspend the Arbitrum Odyssey, which will be resumed after the launch of Nitro: https://twitter.com/arbitrum/status/1542159105946787840
